episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" features discussions on Adolf Hitler's shoe size, the unique linguistic features of the Chalcatongo Mixtec language, King George III's involvement in a fire safety demonstration, and the unusual greeting habits of female hyenas.

facts.fact: In the Indigenous Mexican language of Chalcatongo Mixtec, it is impossible to ask anyone a question.
King George III once went to a safety demonstration which involved putting the king in a house and setting it on fire.
Female hyenas say hello by licking each other's clitorises.
